divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from braken, facing east, my daughter and I saw a flash if bright light in a half circle from the ground rising above the treeline. At first we thought it was a welding flash, since there is a body shop nearby. But it never reappeared. And was too large in size to be a welding flash. This morning, in her way to work in new braunfels, my daughter saw it again, twice. Not in the same area but near freheit rd in new braunfels.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bracken
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright fladh of light in half curcle shape coming from ground and going above treeline
